text_en: The ears are examined before the test because infections and foreign material can affect the result.
With headphones and an audiometer the hearing is tested. This test will determine what kind of hearing loss the patient has.
During the hearing test the patient is asked to respond to a series of tones. The results from the hearing test are coded into an audiogram.
Silicone material is used to make an impression of the ear. It is quick and easy, so a patient coming in for an hour can go away with a hearing aid.
All the hearing aids are custom fitted for the patients.
The hearing aid is ready to use.
